properties.name: app.jwt.secret
properties.description: Base64-encoded 256-bit secret key used to sign JWT tokens.

properties.name: app.jwt.expiration-ms
properties.description: JWT token validity duration in milliseconds. Defaults to 86400000 (24 hours).

properties.name: app.cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed CORS origins (e.g. http://localhost:5173,https://medivault-jet.vercel.app).
